TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit CorrelationCallbackMessageProperty extends System.Object implements class System.ServiceModel.Channels.IMessageProperty
Public MustInherit Class CorrelationCallbackMessageProperty Implements IMessageProperty

summary.span: 提供延後相互關聯索引鍵計算的抽象基底類別，直到所有的相互關聯資料可用為止。

span.span: Provides an abstract base class for deferring correlation key calculation until all of the correlation data is available.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這通常會用於在連線上傳送訊息前，先讓其他通道提供相互關聯資料。This is typically used to allow other channels to provide correlation data before a message is sent on the wire.

summary.span: 由衍生類別的建構函式呼叫，以初始化物件。

span.span: Called by derived class constructors to initialize the object.

summary.span: 由衍生類別呼叫以初始化衍生類別的新執行個體，此衍生類別使用計算相互關聯所需之相互關聯資料的指定集合。

span.span: Called by derived classes to initialize a new instance of the derived class using the specified collection of correlation data that is required to calculate the correlation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當加入所需的相互關聯資料時，會從 清單中移除。When required correlation data is added, it is removed from the list. 當所有必要的資料已經加入，清單是空的傳回`true`。When all required data has been added, the list is empty and returns `true`.

param.name: message
param.span: 要相互關聯的訊息。

span.span: The message to be correlated.

param.name: timeout
param.span: 相互關聯必須在此間隔內完成，否則會擲回 。

span.span: The interval in which correlation must be finalized or else a is thrown.

param.name: callback
param.span: 相互關聯計算完成時要呼叫的方法。

span.span: The method to be called when the correlation calculation is completed.

param.name: state
param.span: 選擇性的應用程式特定物件，其中包含非同步作業的相關資訊。

span.span: An optional application-specific object that contains information about the asynchronous operation.

summary.span: 當所有相互關聯資訊可用於非同步建構相互關聯時，由相互關聯通訊協定呼叫。

span.span: Called by a correlation protocol when all of the correlation information is available to asynchronously construct the correlation.

returns.span: 目前的非同步作業參考。

span.span: A reference to the current asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫 以建構相互關聯。This method calls to construct the correlation. 應用程式必須提供 的實作，此實作會非同步執行指定訊息的相互關聯計算。Applications must provide an implementation of , which asynchronously performs the correlation calculation of the specified message. 當非同步作業完成時要通知，會從 方法呼叫 `callback`。To be notified when the asynchronous operation is complete, call from the `callback` method. 如果在非同步作業完成之前呼叫 ，它會封鎖直到作業完成為止。If is called before the asynchronous operation is complete, it blocks until the operation completes. 如果作業沒有在指定的逾時間隔內完成，則會擲回 。If the operation does not complete within the specified time-out interval a is thrown. 這個方法會使用 非同步設計模式的 非同步版本。This method is an asynchronous version of using the asynchronous design pattern. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[非同步程式設計的概觀](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/asynchronous-programming-model-apm.md)。For more information, see [Asynchronous Programming Overview](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/asynchronous-programming-model-apm.md).

summary.span: 傳回相互關聯的非同步準備訊息。

span.span: Returns the message that was prepared asynchronously for correlation.

returns.span: 準備用於相互關聯的訊息。

span.span: The message that was prepared for correlation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫 以擷取訊息。This method calls to retrieve the message. 應用程式必須提供 的實作，此實作會傳回準備用於相互關聯的訊息。Applications must provide an implementation of , which returns the message that was prepared for correlation. 如果在非同步作業完成之前呼叫 ，它會封鎖直到作業完成為止。If is called before the asynchronous operation is complete, it blocks until the operation completes. 如果作業沒有在呼叫 時的指定逾時間隔內完成，則會在呼叫此方法時擲回 。If the operation did not complete within the time-out interval specified in the call to a is thrown when this method is called. 這個方法會使用 非同步設計模式完成非同步版 。This method completes the asynchronous version of using the asynchronous design pattern. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[非同步程式設計的概觀](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/asynchronous-programming-model-apm.md)。For more information, see [Asynchronous Programming Overview](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/asynchronous-programming-model-apm.md).
